text:
dassohn syndrome/dermatopathia pigmentosa reticularis
What are the treatments for Naegeli-Franceschetti-Jadassohn syndrome/dermatopathia pigmentosa reticularis ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of NFJS/DPR:  - Foundation for Ichthyosis and Related Skin Types (FIRST): Palmoplantar Keratodermas  - Genetic Testing Registry: Dermatopathia pigmentosa reticularis  - Genetic Testing Registry: Naegeli-Franceschetti-Jadassohn syndrome  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Ectodermal Dysplasia
